item.description:
Please RSVP!

TITLE: An evening of Discussion and Stockpicks

DESCRIPTION: We want buy points on good stocks and ETFs. To find these buy points we are taking steps to identify who in the group is knowledgeable about specific asset classes, indexes, industry groups or sectors. Doug's Market Talk and Discussion and StockPicks will seek to elicit stocks and ETFs that are at buy points.

We encourage anyone who trades a particular stock or ETF to tell us all, either via posts on BostonIBD (see instructions below if you are not registered for BostonIBD) or via remarks at meetings in the StockPicks segment, or during Doug's Market Talk. Also, we encourage everyone to sign up for the virtual trading (see the link below) so that we can associate people's remarks with performance.

As regular attendees of our meetings will attest, we prize open discussion. This meeting will have no invited speaker so that we can have an evening of extended discussion about whatever topic you wish to talk about. There will be plenty of time for everyone to get their say and to ask their question.

BOSTON TIGER PRE-MEETING Announcement:
The Boston Tiger Meeting of the Tiger Financial Network meets during the hour from 6:00 PM to 6:50 PM. Go to http://www.tfnn.com/b... to see the full announcement. For questions, see Bob Pod at bpodd@softwareresults.com. The meeting is the same room as the 7:00 meeting.

The agenda for the meetup will be:
6:00 - 6:50 Pre-Meeting with Boston Tigers, led by Bob Podd
7:00 Introduction, Announcements, Polls by Doug
Market Talk and Market Discussion led by Doug
Stockpicks led by Chris
Open Discussion

To join our online discussion go to
http://groups.google....
or send email to DouglasWRoberts@gmail.com.

In order to identify people who evidence expertise in particular interests we have virtual trading.
To join in our virtual trading, go to this link for instructions and signup links:
http://groups.google....

If you have a friend you talk stocks with, bring them with you!

Food or drinks are not allowed in any MIT meeting room.

We strongly urge each person to make his or her own decisions about investing their money. Investment ideas and recommendations made during our meetings and in our online dialogs bear no liability by anyone.

This is a free and open meeting. No membership is required, but please RSVP.
item.name: The Boston Investor's Business Daily January Meetup
